title: S5 Ep28: Inflation and Europe’s public finances
itunes:title: Inflation and Europe’s public finances
description: Recorded live at CEPR Paris Symposium 2022: What are the consequences of an extended period of above-target inflation for the euro area? Agnès Bénassy-Quéré and Giancarlo Corsetti discuss policy options with Tim Phillips.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
